result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 7, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

10:19 AM Defendant Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick appeared via Zoom video.  Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video for Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad appeared by Zoom audio only for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Brewer requests PTC or STC as hasn't been able to talk to client.  11/7 at 11:55 a.m.  Adj.  10:34 a.m.  klr
Status conference on October 24, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:43 a.m. Defendant Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick appeared by video.  Attorney Heidi E. Brewer in court for Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances.  DA requests one more STC in 45 days.  10/24 at 10:30 a.m. STC.  Adj.  10:46 a.m.  klr
Status conference on August 29, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Pre-trial conference on June 29, 2022 at 10:45 am.

09:23 AM Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video means for Defendant Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick. Prosecuting Atty Matthew J Tingstad appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick in court.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Sig bond signed and returned.  Atty Brewer waives reading of complaint, stands mute.  PTC to be scheduled.  June 29th at 10:45 a.m.  Adj.  9:25 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
No possession or consumption of controlled substances, including THC.

ADDRESS INFO for Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick
Current: 424 S. Norfolk Street, Ironwood, MI 49938 United States  (Effective: 05-23-2022)
Prior: 409 Geneva St, Ironwood, MI 49938

1:25 p.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Def appears via phone.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Def failed to appear this a.m.  Warrant from a.m. is now quashed.  Def is going to contact the public def.  Court states charges.  AIA to be set for 6/20 at 9:00 a.m.  DA requests $500 sig bond with provision of no controlled substances.  Court explains THC provision.  Is not legal in WI.  Bond to be signed and returned to Court.  Def provides updated address.  Adj.  1:28 p.m.  klr

09:25 AM Defendant Cassandra Vey Kirkpatrick not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case.  DA requests warrant.  Court authorizes warrant.  $250 to quash/to appear Monday after arrest.  Adj.  9:26 a.m.  klr
